resources.string:
2.1.2
 	 MODIFY： 		 Reduce response time to connect to school servers 		 Remove some redundant code 2.1.1
 	 FIX：
 		 Failed to read the local class schedule without a network after saving the class schedule is checked
 
 2.1
 	 ADD:
 		 Automatic update detection
 		 Display version information
 		 Show Hitokoto
 	 FIX:
 		 Check button problems
 
 2.0
 	 MODIFY:
 		 Use kotlin Refactoring
 		 Remove all class schedules from display, Switch to single week display
 		 The same lesson each week is represented by the same color
 		 Remove the automatic saving of class schedules to local, save or not save according to personal preference.
 		 Do not save cookies locally
 	 ADD:
 		 Log out of current account
 	 FIX:
 		 Error showing the current week
 
 1.2
 	 FIX:
 		 Check button problems
 		 The dialog box list style does not display neatly after switching the class schedule version.
 	 ADD:
 		 New UI display
 
 1.1
 	 FIX:
 		 Network Connection Error Problem
 	 MODIFY:
 		 UI Display
 	 ADD:
 		 Switching class schedule versions
 		 Store class schedules locally in case the school's server goes down.
 
 1.0
 	 Curriculum
